mapper.select: SELECT * FROM videocomment vc, accounts ac where boardId = #{boardId} and vc.accountId = ac.accountId order by commentId desc
mapper.insert: insert into videocomment(accountId, boardId, object, reg_date, mod_date) values(#{accountId}, #{boardId}, #{object}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE videocomment SET object = #{object}, mod_date = now() WHERE commentId = #{commentId}
